samplesource.title: Open Survey

textarea.label: q1
textarea.title: As you watch the video, please rate it by moving the slider left to right.

textarea.label: Q1_0
textarea.title: Please highlight the part of the video that make you rate this particular level of enjoyment. You can also put in your comments to explain your choice.
